runs.comm: full outside off and he hits the first ball with power straight to mid-off on the edge of the circle
pushed through on leg and he gets off the mark with a work off the pads to deep midwicket
stays back in the crease, spins sharply and takes the outer edge as Amla tries to defend, rolls through third man

there we go, Levi absolutely butchers a full ball on middle back down the ground at Amla, who can't get out of the way, gets hit on the foot but it still has enough power to race to the straight boundary off the ricochet
this slides down leg and he is hit on the pad trying to flick, loud appeal for lbw is not upheld
squeezes out a faster ball on off back down the pitch to Hira
starts with a gentle loosener on the pads and all Amla has to do is get bat on ball to send it racing to the fine leg fence
lets it go outside off as it angles across the right-hander
pace and bounce there as Amla stayed rooted to the crease and tried to dab, missed by a considerable margin as it zipped over the top of his bat
that is an on-drive of the purest quality from Amla, it was on the pads and with a hint of wrist, he eases this through midwicket and out to the fence
again goes pushing at a ball angling away from him without the requisite feet movement required to lay bat on ball
again reluctant to get forward to a ball on off and he jabs it to point from the crease
starts with a loose ball on leg and Levi hits his first half-a-dozen of the night with a muscular flick over the backward square boundary

Levi is gone! Tried to repeat the shot but the ball was fractionally closer to middle and he didn't get as much bat on it, Nicol running round from midwicket races around towards deep backward square and takes an outstanding catch low while sliding
Amla hangs back and defends a good length ball on leg into the pitch, they quickly rush through
goes back and punches into the covers
short outside off and Albie wristily whips to the right of mid-on
outside off and he guides it down to third man
this was on leg and a touch short, Amla chipped it over mid-on with the full face and it rushed off to the ludicrously short straight boundary
he does it again but this time gets less elevation on it and sends it to the right of mid-off
this is outside off and moving away a touch, Albie backs away slightly and gets a thick outside edge past the slip in place down to third man
this is on middle and leg and Amla gets on top of the wristy work down to fine leg
that has been belted with considerable might, it was a short ball on middle and it sat up for Albie to pull cleanly across into the stands at cow corner
plays a short-arm pull and bottom edges it to square leg
and he beats Albie first ball outside off as the batsman tries to repeat his earlier six over midwicket
cramped for room as he again sizes up that pull shot, it trickles into the leg side
full on middle and leg, works through midwicket, Amla falls over but gets up quickly and easily gets through
bangs in the bouncer on leg and it sails over Albie who doesn't really attempt a shot as he ducks, not called for either the line or height

Nicol takes his second catch to give fellow King's College attendee Southee his first wicket, Albie tried to smear a full ball outside off across the line and mistimed it badly as Nicol ran in from long-on to take it three-quarters of the way to the fence
Amla cuts a ball outside off into the deep
that is very full outside off and Amla waits to square drive through point and it races away to the boundary
tossed up outside off inviting Amla to attack, Amla obliges and hits a quality inside-out cover drive with power over the cover boundary
gets a thick outside edge to a full one outside off and it rolls to third man
fired into middle and worked into the leg side off the inner edge, the pitch looks to be full of runs, at least 180 needed here
well, Guptill has dropped a tough chance, Amla sliced the drive to the left of Guptill who never got his hands in the right place and spilt it
Amla mistimes the drive down to long-off
outside off and Amla chops it down to third man
AB backs away and forces it into the off side but can't pierce the infield
goes back to a short ball on middle and works it softly out towards the edge of the circle at midwicket, AB wants two but is sent back by Amla
stays on the back foot and slaps a short ball outside off to the cover sweeper
gets forward and defends solidly into the off side
nicely clipped away into the deep at cow corner and they easily take a couple, a third was on but Amla turned it down and AB expresses his displeasure
and strikes first ball! Amla just lamely pushes at one outside off which nips away a touch and Baz does the rest to give a jubilant Bracewell a superb start to his spell
Duminy stays back and defends a ball on off with soft hands towards point
gets forward and defends with the inner edge to the leg side and AB rushes through
tucked away through square leg
Duminy paddle pulls a ball outside off out to deep backward square
worked away into the leg side
cut off the back foot out to deep cover
gets on the front foot and cuts a wide ball outside off into the deep
goes back and plays into the off side
full outside off and dug out to Guptill at short cover
stays in the crease and bottom edges the drive into the covers
Duminy just plants the front foot down the pitch and gets underneath a good length ball on middle and sends it sailing into the North Stand
worked to deep square leg
bangs in a bouncer, the speed gun says 134kph but it looked faster than that, it was on off and Duminy quickly swayed and ducked to get out of harm's way
cover drives a wide ball outside off to short cover
bottom edges a chop into the off side
forced into the covers
worked away through the leg side
goes for the reverse sweep to a fast ball on off, top edges it but comfortably clears third man and heads to the boundary
short and fast on off, pushed into the deep
fortunately gets the reverse sweep in the gap at backward point as it went at catching height through the ring
mistimes the drive to long-on
full outside off and drilled to short cover, who throws down the stumps at the bowler's end but Duminy looks in, the ricochet just speeds off to the boundary
slices a ball outside off through third man and down to the boundary
drives a full ball to long-on
backs away and slices a drive in the air to deep point
full outside off and he gets well under the drive and slices it over the long-off boundary
worked to long-on
driven into the covers
chops the cut to the left of backward point
misses the attempted reverse pull to a short ball outside off and he topples over out of his crease but Baz couldn't collect cleanly and AB survives
swings a full ball on off away just over the cow corner boundary as Southee dived high to try and get a hand to it
backs away and gives himself a bit of room and smacks it over the covers and to the boundary

horrible way for Duminy to depart, AB absolutely creamed a full ball on middle back down the pitch after advancing, Nicol somehow collects and sees Duminy well out backing up too far, Nicol then turns around and whips the bails off with Duminy not even bothering to try and dive back in, to add to the dismissal AB looks to have done some damage to himself
Ontong gets forward and drives to short cover, AB limps back into his crease, he looks in real trouble
Ontong slaps a short ball outside off to the cow corner boundary, he got on top of the ball and rolled his wrists well on the pull
walks down the track and punches to long-off
gets forward and clips into the leg side
gets forward and wristily works into the leg side
hit on the pad outside leg looking to smash it, rolls to third man and AB hobbles through

and clean bowled! AB was in real pain, remains to be seen whether he can keep wickets and skipper the side later on, moved across and tried to slog sweep a ball on leg over the backward square fence, missed and the death rattle began
gets forward and works his first ball to long-on

oh goodness me! First things first, Ontong went for a big swing to a ball spinning in from outsude off, hit him on the thigh on leg and he was given out lbw, in the meantime he has a Mark Richardson moment and the bat flies out of his hand like a discus down to fine leg!
outside off and dabbed through third man
tucked into the leg side
cuts into the deep off the back foot
and almost gets another wicket! Induces an edge from Parnell with the angle across the left-hander, the nick goes agonisingly to the right of a diving Ryder at first slip
defends back down the pitch
bangs in another bouncer on leg, Parnell ducks and then waves the bat at it unsuccessfully
slower ball outside off, it is a full toss but he can't do much other than mistime it to leg
goes back and punches to Guptill who rushes across to mid-off to stop it
has a swing and a miss at a ball outside off to end a good over for the home side
Botha inside edges into his pad and it drops in the crease, no chance of sneaking a single
again inside edges a ball on off and can't make much of it
beaten outside off trying to dab it through the covers, Southee has a few words, his chat on the field has been the subject of much debate in the New Zealand cricket media during the week
ninth dot ball in a row, Botha punches straight to Guptill at short cover

that is a stunner! It's Martin Guptill making amends for his rare drop earlier on, it was outside off and Botha butchered a cover drive high above the fielder, who dived and plucked it with his left hand at rapid speed before hanging on
stays back in the crease and controls the steer to third man
pushed well outside off past the attempted cut, called wide by the umpires to the New Zealanders' displeasure
drives a full ball outside off into the covers
mistimes the pull from outside off and bottom edges it to wide mid-on
opens the face and plays to point
short ball on leg and he top-edges the pull on the bounce to fine leg
slices an inside out drive off a slower ball into the covers and they can scamper back
slashes at a ball outside off and gets it to travel to the third man boundary
misses the heave to leg as it turns away sharply from leg stump
heaves the slog-sweep along the ground to deep backward square
fired into leg stump and he is hit on the pad as he misses the pull
goes back and cuts it straight back past Nicol, he had to wait an age for that at 74kph
switch hits a full ball on leg down to long-off (or long-on, depending on your view)
goes back and heaves along the ground to deep midwicket
doesn't look like it, the first ball has been deposited by Parnell into the stands at long-off, it was a good length ball on middle and Parnell dispatched it with ease
terrible full toss wide of off, Parnell throws the bat at it and bottom edges it to Baz, Southee fortunate to escape punishment there
smears a full ball on off across the line to long-on
full toss on off is sliced away into the deep on the off side and Hira takes a while to get the throw in, they sneak a second and Baz is not happy and expressed his disgust
tries to reverse sweep a full ball outside off, can't make contact as it goes through to Baz
the last ball is another full toss outside off, Peterson doesn't connect all that well but gets enough power on the aerial slice through the covers to beat a diving Guptill on the boundary
